turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hiya. Can you help me get a pizza order going?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want three small pizzas with thick crust, and on one of them I want Canadian bacon, on the second one I want pineapple, and on the last one I want green pepper and olive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i know you mentioned u want thick crust. did u want thick crust for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.88 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think we're all set. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. take care, and enjoy those pizzas.
